name: Quick Tour
description: Get a comprehensive overview of the North African Campaign in just a couple of hours. Perfect for building foundational knowledge before diving deeper.

name: Deep Dive
description: A thorough exploration of every aspect of the Desert War, from Rommel's arrival through to the Axis surrender in Tunisia. Ideal for serious students of history.

name: Special Forces Track
description: Focus on the birth of modern special forces. Learn how the SAS and LRDG pioneered behind-the-lines warfare in the North African desert.

name: Commanders & Decisions Track
description: Study the key decision-makers on both sides. Analyze the strategic and tactical choices made by Rommel, Montgomery, and other desert commanders.
